articles.title: Boston museums offer artful ways to escape winter
articles.description: February can be one long (even at 28 days), cold slog. Fortunately, Boston’s world-class museums have can’t-miss events and exhibitions on tap to brighten, and enlighten, your day. Here’s an artful trio to put on your calendar: MUSEUM OF FINE ARTS 465 Hunting…

articles.author: Hannah Lawrence, Hannah Lawrence
articles.title: Female researcher hits back after Norwegian colonel claims recruiting more women into the army makes it weaker
articles.description: A researcher has hit back at a Norwegian commander who claimed women joining Norway’s armed forces had made it weaker. Nina Rones, of the Norwegian Defence Research Institute, hit back at Lieutenant Colonel Harald Høiback, saying evidence contradicts his clai…

articles.author: Hannah Lawrence, Hannah Lawrence
articles.title: France finds traces of radioactive material on imported mushrooms
articles.description: France has found traces of radioactive material on an import of Belarus mushrooms, according to officials. The radioactive material is thought to be from Chernobyl and is not linked to a radioactive cloud that developed in southern Russia last month, official…
